properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Montauk NY to Marthas Vineyard extending out to 20 nm South of Block Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 4:01AM EST until January 7 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Montauk NY to Marthas Vineyard
extending out to 20 nm South of Block Island.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY
